title: ICC Cricket World Cup Qualifier 2018 Scoreboard
text: March 25, 2018 / 2:12 PM / Updated 2 hours ago UPDATE 2-ICC Cricket World Cup Qualifier 2018 Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Mar 25 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of final between West Indies and Afghanistan on Sunday at Harare, Zimbabwe Afghanistan win by 7 wickets West Indies 1st innings Chris Gayle c Sharafuddin Ashraf b Mujeeb Ur Rahman 10 Evin Lewis c Mohammad Shahzad b Gulbadin Naib 27 Shai Hope lbw Rashid Khan 23 Marlon Samuels c Rahmat Shah b Gulbadin Naib 17 Shimron Hetmyer c Mohammad Shahzad b Sharafuddin Ashraf 38 Rovman Powell b Mujeeb Ur Rahman 44 Carlos Brathwaite c Asghar Stanikzai b Dawlat Zadran 14 Ashley Nurse Not Out 26 Keemo Paul lbw Mujeeb Ur Rahman 0 Kemar Roach b Mujeeb Ur Rahman 0 Extras 0b 2lb 0nb 0pen 3w 5 Total (46.5 overs) 204 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-16 Gayle, 2-50 Lewis, 3-73 Samuels, 4-99 Hope, 5-101 Holder, 6-138 Hetmyer, 7-163 Brathwaite, 8-204 Powell, 9-204 Paul, 10-204 Roach Did Not Bat : Holder Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Dawlat Zadran 7 0 26 1 3.71 2w Mujeeb Ur Rahman 9.5 0 43 4 4.37 1w Gulbadin Naib 5 0 28 2 5.60 Mohammad Nabi 9 1 37 0 4.11 Sharafuddin Ashraf 7 0 26 1 3.71 Rashid Khan 9 0 42 1 4.67 Afghanistan 1st innings Mohammad Shahzad c Jason Holder b Chris Gayle 84 Gulbadin Naib c Chris Gayle b Keemo Paul 14 Rahmat Shah st Shai Hope b Chris Gayle 51 Samiullah Shenwari Not Out 20 Mohammad Nabi Not Out 27 Extras 0b 2lb 0nb 0pen 8w 10 Total (40.4 overs) 206-3 Fall of Wickets : 1-58 Naib, 2-148 Mohammadi, 3-170 Zurmatai Did Not Bat : Stanikzai, Zadran, Khan, Ashraf, Zadran, Ur Rahman Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Kemar Roach 5 0 24 0 4.80 Jason Holder 6 0 45 0 7.50 3w Carlos Brathwaite 6 0 37 0 6.17 1w Keemo Paul 8 0 29 1 3.62 1w Ashley Nurse 10 2 31 0 3.10 1w Chris Gayle 5.4 0 38 2 6.71 1w Umpire Simon Fry Umpire Michael Gough Video Paul Wilson Match Referee Graeme Labrooy
